snippet: One of the founders of an influential hard-core punk band, the Cro-Mags, was charged with attacking the current bassist at Webster Hall on Friday.
abstract: Harley Flanagan, founding bass player of influential hard-core punk band the Cro-Mags, is charged with stabbing Michael Couls, the current bass player, at a concert event at Webster Hall in the East Village.

byline.contributor: Aaron Edwards and Christopher Maag contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: One of the founders of an influential hard-core punk band, the Cro-Mags, was charged with attacking the current bassist at Webster Hall on Friday.

headline.seo: Behind Stabbing, a Feud About a Band Called the Cro-Mags
headline.main: A Stabbing, and a Feud About a Band
headline.print_headline: A Stabbing, and a Feud About a Band
